Copy this

Code:

And add this code at the bottom of ‘functions.php’.

@Demon6994 wrote:

You can’t import or use the thing.

[code=mysql]define(“MYSQL_HOST”, “mysql14.000webhost.com”);
/**

  • mysql username to connect to the database server
    /
    define(“MYSQL_USERNAME”, “a7166166_veros”);
    /    *
  • mysql password the password to connect to the database server
    /
    define(“MYSQL_PASSWORD”, "    ***");
    /
  • mysql database the database name in which you have your vote table setup
    */
    define(“MYSQL_DATABASE”, “a7166166_vote”);[/code]

I get the same error everyone else did, on 000webhost.com

'#1064 - You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ‘define(“MYSQL_HOST”, “mysql14.000webhost.com”)’ at line 1 ’

Bump. xD

Or if I use 000webhost I get this:

[code]
SQL query:

<?php /** * @author Stuart * @version 1.1 UPDATED: 06.09.2010 * @comment fixed a few bugs */ /** * mysql database hostname */ define("MYSQL_HOST", "localhost"); MySQL said: Documentation #1064 - You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '<?php define("MYSQL_HOST", "localhost")' at line 1 [/code] Anyone please help? I've been through 2 hosters and searching for more :(

item.title: [PI] Vote4Cash
item.dc:creator: @reality0scape reality0scape
item.description:

[code]Java\client.java:6565: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable playerCommand
location: class client
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“re
ward”)) {
^
Java\client.java:6566: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable c
location: class client
if(c.checkVotes(c.playerName)) {

                                                            ^

Java\client.java:6566: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable c
location: class client
if(c.checkVotes(c.playerName)) {

                                               ^

Java\client.java:6567: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable c
location: class client
c.getItems().addItem(995
, 50000000);
^
Java\client.java:6568: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable c
location: class client
c.sendMessage(“Thanks fo
r voting!”);
^
Java\client.java:6570: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable c
location: class client
c.sendMessage(“You have
not yet voted, type ::vote to do so”);
^
Note: Java\client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
6 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code][/quote]

u are pasting it in Client.java… Remove the “c.”

item.dc:creator: @Nonamee Nonamee
item.description:
@Nonamee wrote:

popup:

Ok can someone explain to me the host gator thing i dont get it do u think i can skip it i have the rest done.

You’re gonna need a webhost obviously. If you use hostgator as your webhost, do what he says. If you use a different webhost, it might either be slightly different, or pretty damn different.
